Texts.Eng:
Thank you for saving the Universe « we hope you enjoyed playing Starbound every bit as much as we enjoyed making it. The Universe is free for you to explore. Safe travels!

- Chucklefish Games  ^orange;°

- Chucklefish Games ^orange;°
